data.name: Name
data.entity_id: ID of the entity that tracks current available to EVSE
data.phase_a_current_entity_id: Sensor that measures site import current for single phase charging
data.phase_b_current_entity_id: Sensor that measures site import current for the second phase when 2 phase charging
data.phase_c_current_entity_id: Sensor that measures site import current for the third phase when 3 phase charging
data.chargin_mode_entity_id: Input select entity that sets the charging mode
data.main_breaker_rating: Rating of the main breaker (per phase)
data.invert_phases: Invert current readings if import measures as a negative number
data.default_charge_current: Default charge current in amperes. This is set as the default charge profile on the EVSE
data.evse_current_import_entity_id: Sensor that measures the current imported by the EVSE
data.evse_current_offered_entity_id: Sensor that measures the current offered by the EVSE
data.max_import_power_entity_id: Sensor that measures the maximum import power
data.update_frequency: Frequency in seconds to update the EVSE status
data.ocpp_profile_timeout: Timeout in seconds for OCPP profile
data.charge_pause_duration: Duration in seconds to pause charging
